Title: Meet the New Boss
Writer: Jonathan Tropper (created by), David Schickler (created by), Jonathan Tropper, David Schickler
Actors: Antony Starr, Ivana Milicevic, Ulrich Thomsen, Frankie Faison
Plot: Anastasia breaks into her father's extremely secure home to make a deal for her safety. Proctor and Longshadow make a deal to build a hotel on the reservation. Hood performs his brand of an arrest on a rapist, ultimate fighter champion.
